bio.description: I'm a senior at Bronx Science who loves combining programming and math to build creative real-world applications.
bio.coding: I like creating programs using React, Swift, or Python, and I'm very interested in AI/ML
bio.contact: Feel free to reach out to me through email or just message me on Linkedin!

skills.name: Python
skills.desc: Machine Learning, Data Science, Regression, Classification, Clustering, Django, Selenium

skills.name: Java
skills.desc: Object-Oriented, JDBC, Lambdas, Data Structures, Algorithms

desc: - Led a 6 week immersion program that provided an insight to an industry-level startup experience, resulting in almost $1000 in revenue
- Managed meetings to help students get familiarized with popular technologies such as React, Sass, and Node.js by creating lessons and demonstrations
- Introduced bugs of various difficulties in a Netflix clone to challenge and encourage students to think of new features
- Ported existing applications from Android to iOS, adapting software to meet unique parameters
- Designed app mockups to improve UI/UX using Figma
- Collaborated with Backend Team to research and build an API for integration into the app
- Developed automation portal using React to increase productivity by providing mentors and interns the means to manage the planning, development, and execution of their startups
- Revised, modularized, and updated old codebases to modern development standards allowing the portal to load 10x faster
- Integrated Firebase cloud functions to automate sending emails and creating folders using Gmail and Google Drive APIs
- Worked to increase personal device security by providing continuous than one-time authentication to the user
- Achieved 97% accuracy on novel ML text classifying models created to uniquely identify users based on their stylometric features
- Developed a cross-platform app using React-Native and Firebase to collect stylometric data on which research was conducted and models were trained

projects.name: Learning Made Simple (LMS)
projects.meta: A learning management system, similar to Google Classroom, for students and teachers that makes remote learning easy. A teacher side applicaiton would allow the teacher to create classes, add students, make announcements, post assignments, and grade student's works. The student side application would allow the student to join a class, make announcements, and submit homework.

projects.name: Agora
projects.meta: An iOS ecommerce app specifically for trees and tree accessories. Integrated a serverless backend application, using MongoDB Atlas as the database, to the frontend iOS application.

projects.name: AI Flappy Bird
projects.meta: An AI that learns and teaches itself the popular game Flappy Bird. It performed 48 generations, each with 60 Flappy Birds, before ending the simulation at 3 birds scoring 250 points

projects.name: Google Assistant
projects.meta: A voice assistant that would relay information about your inbox, events in your google calendar, youtube subscriptions, etc.
